title: The retired Marines who were forced to remove the U.S. Decimal Meats, the neighbors keep Obama stickers.
subtitle: Was a retired Marine forced to remove UMC badges from his car or to pay a fine, while his neighbors kept Obama's posters?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A retired Marine was forced to remove USMC badges from his car or fine, while neighbours were allowed to keep Obama posters without incident.
